title: The tenements so constructed in execution of the Project are offered to slum dwellers located on land belonging to Govt
clause_text: The tenements so constructed in execution of the Project are offered to slum dwellers located on land belonging to Govt. or Public Authority and needed forvital public purpose and within 270 days from the date of issue of LOI the Agency shall identify the slum dwellers.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
